title: Smart Watches 4
desc1: The Apple Watch, with its inbuilt speaker and microphone, gives you the freedom to call your friends directly from your wrist. This splash-resistant smartwatch features an S1P dual-core processor for a fast and smooth performance. It has a digital crown, along with a heart rate sensor, gyroscope, ambient light sensor and an accelerometer. Its Rose Gold aluminium case and Midnight Blue strap further add to its appeal
desc2: Additional Details: This device’s battery life lasts for up to 18 hours, including 45 minutes of using apps and a 30?minute workout with music playback, and checking time and notifications 90 times each. The battery life may vary based on usage. The Apple Watch app is required to use this device’s smart functions.

title: Wireless Multiroom Speaker
desc1: Samsung ring radiator technology disperses sound in all directions so you can enjoy your favourite music in 360°.
desc2: Capture every detail and note with a 25mm tweeter, 125mm woofer and 192/kHz/24-bit sampling you can enjoy a high definition audio playback.
desc3: With a wireless design and built-in battery the Samsung multi-room speaker can be moved throughout the home or even outside.
